arr: Built - in ZigBee 2.4 G wireless transceiver module
Supports large number of 2, 500 devices connection
Able to achieve short & long distance controlling LED lights by multi solutions
SC, CT, RGB and RGBW (4 in 1) are optional
Work with Philips HUE , Osram Lightify & Lightify Pro and other based ZLL / HA1 .2 / Zigbee3 .0 standard gateways, and compatible with Amazon Echo/ Alexa
